attributes.action: allow the Red Arrows to perform at the opening ceremony of the 2012 Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The news that the Department of Culture, Media and Sport have banned the Red Arrows from performing at the ceremony is absolutely outrageous. There is no finer way to wow the crowds and get them ready for the games than to allow our mighty display team to perform what they would have been their best ever display.

Sack the fool that ruled against them and let the Reds fly!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
